attributes.action: Stop dogging on the Cotswold Way
attributes.additional_details: More funding to tackle the long term and increasingly popular illegal activity of dogging (sexual misconduct) along the A4 from Junction 18 to Tog Hill and particularly alone one stretch of The Cotswold Way.  This activitity is happening daily in broad daylight and to the threat of public users.  More funding to police this particular area and activity required as well as more targeted signage in particular "no parking" signs.  This is an area of outstanding natural beauty and popular with innocent walkers and residence feel intimidated as well as are sick if having to see it.

rejection.details: We believe this would be an operational policing matter for the local force concerned.
